name: Horizon's Rift
description:
You know the drill with this one! A classic bit of fun, fly through space in this top down shooter blasting away at the alien invaders!

This was the first game in Unity that I made, I have plenty of ideas for improving the game play with better AI, improved layout (ie, resolution adaptation), etc.

You'll see in the screenshots there is support for EveryPlay in the Android version, that has been disabled for this download, but will be re-enabled later when it's more polished..

This needs a lot of polishing, but just wanted to get it out there.

Now Available On Windows Store!

Download "Horizon's Rift" from the Microsoft Windows Store.
